21269.「おお……。<pc>か……。\n よく…来てくれたな……。\n ルナナの足取りが:
Oh... <pc>... how nice... that you
came... to find out... where Lunana is... and
how she got there...

21270.「ルナナは 魔獣ビュブロスを…追って……\n このラニアッカから 南西のザグバン:
Lunana followed the Magical Beast Byblos from here in Raniakka southwest through the Zagban Hills to the Cave of Zaag in the far south.
...

21271.「じつはな…… その ザアグの洞門こそ\n わしが かつて レオン・ビュブロを討:
You see... the Cave of Zaag is the place where
I once defeated Leon Byblo... and where Holta
died. The place of our meeting.

21272.「なにやら いやな予感がする……。\n レオン・ビュブロの子である 魔獣ビュブロ:
I have a bad feeling about this... Why is
Magical Beast Byblos, the son of Leon Byblo,
heading to the place of their connection...?

21273.「<pc>よ…… 時は来た。\n わしを…… かの地まで 導いてくれぬか？\n:
The time has come, <pc>. Will you
lead me to the land of the dead? And protect
Lunana from the fangs of the beast.

21274.「ありがたい。本当に 恩に着る……。\n 目がかすみ…… いよいよ 誰かの手を借:
Thank you. I am truly indebted to you... my
eyes are blurry... and at last I can do
nothing without someone's help. ...

21275.「だが あの杖さえ 取り戻せば……\n わしも ビュブロスと戦える……。\n そ:
But as long as I get that staff back I can
fight Byblos, and until then I will follow you
desperately. I will follow you.

21276.「<pc>…… 頼んだぞ……。\n ホルタとルナナ ふたりの不幸な運命の連鎖は\:
<pc>... please... Holta and Lunana,
we must break the chain of their unfortunate
fate...!

21277.「引き受けてくれるのは ありがたいが……。\n おぬしは…… 他の者の依頼が\n:
I'm glad you're willing to do this but you
seem to have a lot of other people's requests
piling up.

21278.「仕方あるまい……。\n わしは しばらく ここにいるから\n 先に そちらを片:
Well, I'll be here for a while, so why don't
you go and take care of that first...

21279.「そうか……。だが 情けないことに\n 今のわしは ひとりでは 何もできん……。:
I see... but the pity is that now I can't do
anything on my own... and you are my only
hope...

21280.「<pc>よ…… 頼む……。\n 気が変わったら また来てくれんか……。\n わ:
<If you change your mind please come back to
me I have to protect Lunana. I have to protect
Lunana.

21281.「おお……。<pc>か……。\n よく…来てくれたな……。\n ルナナの足取りが:
Oh... <pc>... how nice of you... to
come... now we know... where Lunana's steps
are...

21282.「ルナナは 魔獣ビュブロスを…追って……\n このラニアッカから 南西のザグバン:
Lunana followed the Magical Beast Byblos from here in Raniakka southwest through the Zagban Hills to the Cave of Zaag in the far south.
...

21283.「じつはな…… その ザアグの洞門こそ\n わしが かつて レオン・ビュブロを討:
You see... the Cave of Zaag is the place where
I once defeated Leon Byblo... and where Holta
died. The place of our meeting.

21284.「<pc>よ…… 時は来た。\n わしを…… かの地まで 導いてくれぬか？\n:
The time has come, <pc>. Will you
lead me to the land of the dead? And protect
Lunana from the fangs of the beast.

21285.「わしの杖を奪った ルナナは……\n 最後の…魔獣ビュブロスを追い ザグバン丘陵:
Having taken my Staff, Lunana's Staff, she followed the last Magical Beast Byblos to the Cave of Zaag at the far southern end of the
Zagban Hills...

21286.「その ザアグの洞門こそ……\n わしが かつて レオン・ビュブロを討ち……\n:
The Cave of Zaag is where I once killed Leon
Byblo and where Holta ended up.

21287.「<pc>よ…… 時は来た。\n わしを…… その因縁の地まで 導き……\n そ:
<The time has come. Lead me to the land of our
karma and protect Lunana from the fangs of the
hexenbiest.

21288.「あの杖さえ 取り戻せば……\n わしも ビュブロスと戦える……。\n それまで:
As long as I get that staff back I can fight
Byblos, but until then I will follow you
desperately. I'll follow you.

21289.「<pc>…… 頼んだぞ……。\n ホルタとルナナ ふたりの不幸な運命の連鎖は\:
<pc>... please... Holta and Lunana,
we must break the chain of their unfortunate
fate...!

21290.「……着いたぞ。ここが わしらの因縁の地。\n よもや このようなかたちで……\:
Here we are. This is the place where we had
our history. I never thought I'd visit it
again... in this form...

21292.「ルナナァ……ッ！！ 杖を……\n その杖を わしに よこすのだ……ッ！！:
Lunanar! Give me the sceptre... and give me
the sceptre...!

21293.「ふふん。遅い！\n 遅いわよ 賢者ブロッゲン！: Hmmm. You're late! You're late, Sage Broggen!

21294.「この魔獣は あたしのエモノよ！\n こいつを倒して あたしの輝かしい経歴に\n:
This hexenbiest is mine! I will defeat this
beast and add another page to my illustrious
career!

21295.「お…愚かな……。欲に 目がくらみおって……。\n あの杖は… わしが使わなくて:
Foolishly blinded by greed I must use the
staff.

21296.「さあ 棒切れ！ いよいよ アンタの出番よ！\n 目の前にいる魔獣を ケチョンケ:
Come on, stick! Now it's your turn! Now it's your turn... to beat the crap out of the hexenbiest that's standing right in front of
you!

21297.「何度 言ったら わかるでアールか！！\n ワガハイは 魔獣の光線を 防ぐのみ！:
How many times have I told you? I will
only block the ray of the beast! And
Broggen will finish him off!

21298.「この期に及んで なに言ってるのよ！！\n そんな つまんないジョークは いいか:
What are you talking about? I don't want any
more of your stupid jokes. Just attack...

21299.「グルルル……。その愚かな物言い……。\n 我が父を討った 神父ホルタの忘れ形見:
Grrrrr... That's a stupid thing to say... I
can hardly think of a better way to remember
Father Holta, who avenged my father...

21300.「……ハァ！？ なんで 魔物のクチから\n 父さんの名前が 出てくるワケ？:
Huh? Why is my father's name coming out of the
monster's mouth?

21301.「グルルル……。無知とは 恐ろしい……。\n どうやら ここへ おびきだされたこ:
Grrrrr... ignorance is a terrible thing... and
apparently you don't even know you've been
lured here...

21302.「我ら兄弟は 父を葬った ふたりの男に\n 真の復讐を果たすことのみを\n 使命:
We siblings have lived our entire lives with
only one mission in mind: to exact true
revenge on the two men who buried our father.

21303.「幾多の旅人から 魂を吸い集めたのは\n この地に眠る 父の怨念を呼び覚ますため:
I have gathered the souls of many a traveler to awaken the hatred of my Dad Soul that lies dormant in this land! Now, I will unleash my
true vengeance!

21304.「無念の地に眠る 父 レオン・ビュブロよ！\n ついに 復讐のときは 来た！\n:
My father, Leon Byblo, who lies in the land of the damned! The time for vengeance has come! Entrust me with your power, and I will become
a raging beast of darkness!

21306.「な…なんということだ……。\n あれは…… レオン・ビュブロそのもの……。\n:
Oh... my... my... my God, that was... that was
Leon Byblo himself... that's why he came
here... to be with us... to be with us.

21307.「この姿で 父のカタキを討ち\n そして その血筋をも 根絶やしにする……。\n:
In this form, I will avenge my father's murder
and exterminate his bloodline... for that is
true vengeance.

21308.「神父ホルタの 忘れ形見……！\n まずは 貴様を 一撃で葬ってくれる！！\n:
Father Holta's last reminder. First, he'll
bury you with a single blow! Tremble! You
little girl!!

21311.「ダメだ……！ あれでは 杖が もたん……！\n ヤツの…攻撃が 強すぎる……！:
No! The wand is not strong enough. It's
attacking too hard.

21313.「もう… 限界で…アーーーーーーール！！！！:
I'm... I'm at the end of my rope...
arrrrrrrrrrr ！！！！

21314.「小賢しいマネを……。: I'm not going to play coy...

21315.「それほどまで 死に急ぐのなら\n 貴様から 血祭りにあげてくれるわァッ！！:
If you're in such a hurry to die, I'll make a
bloodbath out of you!

21316.「<cs_pchero> わしは もう動けん……。\n 今 この危機を救えるのは:
<cs_pchero> I can no longer move and you are
the only one who can save me from this crisis.
You must strike Leon Byblo down.

21318.「我が復讐に アダなす者よ……。\n また 現れたか……。:
He who is addicted to my vengeance... has
appeared again...

21319.「邪魔立ては 許さぬ！\n 今度こそ 血祭りにあげてくれるわァッ！！:
You will not stand in my way! This time,
they'll make a bloodbath of us!

21320.「ウゴァァァァァァ………………！！！\n 我が…復讐がぁぁぁ……！\n ち…父よ:
UGHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH! My
revenge...! Father... forgive me...!

21325.「……ふん。\n コイツ…… 父親のチカラなんかに頼るから\n こんな あわれな:
Hmm... He........it's because he relied on his
father's power that he met such a pitiful end.

21326.「ルナナ……。無事で なによりだ……。\n さあ その杖を わしに返せ……。\n:
Lunana I'm glad to see you're all right but now return the staff to me as you will no longer be needing it. You don't need it
anymore... do you?

21327.「ハァ！？ 冗談じゃないわよ！: Huh! You've got to be kidding me!

21328.「こんな使える杖 簡単に 手放すものですか！\n これがあれば どんな攻撃にも耐:
I wouldn't give up my trusty cane so easily! You know that it can withstand any attack? With the right tools, fame is at your
fingertips!

21329.「それよりも……。ねえ！\n なんで あの魔物 父さんのこと 知ってたの？\n:
More importantly... Hey! How did that monster
know about my father? Are you... hiding
something?

21331.「……杖があれば どんな攻撃にも耐えられる？\n やれやれ……。父親に頼っている:
...and with the cane, you can withstand any
attack? Oh dear... I'm sure you're just as
dependent on your father as I am...

21332.「ハァ！？ この棒 なに言ってんの！？\n ワケわかんないこと 言ってんじゃない:
Huh? What are you talking about? Don't talk
nonsense!

21333.「……あたしは 名声なんか いらない！\n そう言って 名の知れた父親を 嫌って:
I don't want fame! The boy who used to hate
his famous father is now a fame freak?

21334.「なんで……？ なんで そのことを……！？: Why did you...? Why did you tell me that?

21336.「……はい ブロッゲンさま。\n もはや 復讐の因果は 解かれましたし\n ちょ:
Yes, Mr. Broggen. Now that the karma of
revenge has been undone, I thought it would be
a good time...

21337.「ちょ… ちょっと 待ちなさいよ！\n 今 ホルタって 言った！？\n その杖が:
Wait a minute! Did you just say Holta? You're
telling me that that cane is my father?

21338.「……ルナナ よく聞きなさい。\n 私は はやり病で 果てたのではありません。\:
Lunana, listen to me. I did not die of an
epidemic. I was murdered by Leon Byblo.

21339.「かつて 私と ブロッゲンさまは\n レオン・ビュブロと戦い 勝利しました。\n:
Once upon a time, I and the Lady Broggen
fought Leon Byblo and we won. But the cost was
too great...

21340.「……私は 致命的なキズを負い\n ブロッゲンさまも また 全精力を使い果たし\:
...I was mortally wounded, and Broggen, too,
was drained of all energy and unable to take a
single step.

21341.「放っておけば 死に至るのは 明白……。\n たとえ 命を取り留めたとしても\n:
It's obvious that if left unchecked, they will die... and even if they do survive, they won't be able to live without the support of
others...

21342.「ブロッゲンさまの 心と身体は\n それほどまでに 弱り果てていたのです。:
Broggen's mind and body were in such a
weakened state.

21343.「そこで 私は いよいよ事切れる直前……\n ブロッゲンさまに こう申し上げまし:
Then, just before it was about to expire... I
said this to Mr. Broggen.

21344.「これからは 私が 目となり クチとなり\n あなたを 支えていきましょう。どう:
From now on, I will be your eyes, your mouth,
and your support. Please carry my dying soul
in your wand....

21345.「……こうして 私の命は 尽きましたが\n 私は ブロッゲンさまの杖として\n:
And so my life ended, but I was reborn as
Broggen's Staff.

21346.「なかば眠っている ブロッゲンさまに代わり\n 杖である私が 世話を焼いているの:
That's why I, Broggen's Staff, am taking care
of him in place of the half-asleep Broggen.

21347.「そして ルナナ……。\n 私は 杖となってからも\n あなたのことを 見ていま:
And Lunana's Staff I have been watching you
since you became a staff.

21348.「ウソでしょ……。\n ホントに この杖が 父さんだったなんて……。:
I can't believe... this cane is really my
father.

21349.「……昔の あなたは 功名心の鬼ではなかった。\n しかし 今は 周りの人を巻き:
...In the past, you were not an ogre of merit. But now, you seem to be trying to force your way to fame, even if it involves those around
you...

21350.「あなたが そんな風に変わってしまったのは\n 死んでしまった 私のため……。:
You changed like that because of me, because
I'm dead...

21351.「……そう。私以上の 名声を得ることで\n 私が生きているときに できなかった親:
Yes. It seems to me that by achieving more fame than I did, he is trying to fulfill the filial piety that he could not do when I was
alive.

21352.「本当に そうだとしたら\n 私は 素直に うれしいです。\n ありがとう ルナ:
If that's really the case, I'm honestly happy.
Thank you, Lunana...

21353.「ふん……。父さんが そう思うなら\n 勝手に そう思ってれば？: If you think so, go ahead and think so.

21355.「本当に 名声を得たいのであれば\n 私利私欲を 忘れなさい。\n そして 周囲:
If you really want to make a name for
yourself, forget about self-interest. And
become someone people can trust.

21356.「ちょ…… ちょっと待ったッ！！\n いい話になるかと思ったら お説教！？\n:
Wait a minute! I thought this was going to be
a good story, but now you're lecturing me? I'm
not going to be lectured by a cane!

21357.「あたしは あたしのやり方で 生きていくの！\n だいたいね！ あたしは昔っから:
I'm going to live my life my way! Most of the
time! I've always hated my preachy father!

21358.「あー ヤダヤダ！ 自分の父親が 棒だなんて\n 恥ずかしくって 誰にも言えない:
Oh, no, no, no! I'm too embarrassed to tell
anyone that my father is a stick! I feel
really bad!

21359.「ムチェッ ブチャッ！ 行くわよ！\n こんなとこ さっさと引き上げましょう！:
Muchacho! Buchacho! Let's go! Let's get the
hell out of here!

21360.「ルナナッ！ 待ちなさい！\n まだ 話が……: Lunanak! Lunana! Wait! I need to talk to you.

21362.「……話なんて いつでも できるじゃない。\n 父さんは そこにいるって\n わ: We can always talk. I know you're there.

21363.「それよりも…… いいッ？\n その杖から しっかり見ときなさいよ！\n あたし:
But more importantly... Watch me with that
cane! I'm about to make a legend out of
myself!

21364.「やれやれ……。\n 根は 悪い子ではないんですがねえ。\n どこで 教育を 間:
He's not a bad kid at heart, but... I wonder
where I went wrong in my education...

21365.「<cs_pchero>さん。旅人の あなたなら\n また あの子に 会うかもし:
<cs_pchero>. You, a traveler, might meet her
again. I would appreciate it if you could take
care of her for me then.

21366.「それではッ！ ワガハイは\n いつもの しゃべり方に 戻るでアール！！\n こ:
Well then! I'm going back to my usual way of
speaking! I like this one a lot.

21367.「<cs_pchero>……。\n おぬしの おかげで ホルタ親子は救われた。\:
<cs_pchero>... thanks to you, Holta and her
son were saved. I am truly grateful.

21368.「これは 今までの礼だ。\n 受け取ってくれ。:
This is a token of my appreciation for all
you've done. Take it.

21369.「<cs_pchero>よ。わしは いつか\n 子供たちに 怒鳴ったことがあった:
<cs_pchero>. I once yelled at my children.
This staff is made of my sins.

21370.「そう……。この杖は わしの罪だ。\n 戦友のホルタに 安らかな眠りを与えず\n:
Yes, this staff is my sin. It is my fault for
not giving my friend Holta a good night's
sleep, for locking him in the staff...

21371.「犯した罪は 消えるものではない。\n ……だが ホルタとルナナが 心を通わし\:
The crime that has been committed cannot be
erased. But Holta and Lunana's communication
has made my heart feel a little better.

21372.「今ならば あの子供たちに\n 笑って 杖を 見せられるかもしれんな。:
Maybe now I can show those kids the cane with
a smile on my face.

21373.「それでは <cs_pchero>。\n わしは この杖…ホルタと ふたたび旅に:
Well then <cs_pchero>. I'm going on my
journey again with my stick, Holta. I'll see
you again somewhere.

21374.「<cs_pchero>！ さようならでアーール！\n 本当に ありがとうなので:
<cs_pchero>! Aaarghh bye bye! Thank you so
much for everything, so
aaarrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr!
